info.title: Google Sheet Sync Laravel API
info.description: A Laravel-based API to synchronize data with Google Sheets. This API allows authentication using OAuth 2.0 and supports reading, writing, appending, and managing Google Spreadsheet data.

post.summary: Create a new sheet in the spreadsheet

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: ID of the spreadsheet where the new sheet will be created

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: Name of the new sheet to be created

requestBody.description: Optional sheet title and data to populate

500.description: Error occurred while creating the sheet

delete.description: Deletes a Google Spreadsheet by its ID.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to delete.

404.description: Spreadsheet not found or could not be deleted

error.example: Spreadsheet not found or could not be deleted

delete.summary: Delete a specific sheet in a Google Spreadsheet
delete.description: Deletes a sheet in the specified Google Spreadsheet by its name.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet from which the sheet will be deleted.

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: The name of the sheet to delete.

404.description: Sheet not found or could not be deleted

error.example: Sheet not found or could not be deleted

get.summary: Read data from a specific sheet in a Google Spreadsheet
get.description: Fetches the data from the specified sheet in a Google Spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to read data from.

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: The name of the sheet to read data from.

post.summary: Insert data into a specific sheet in a Google Spreadsheet
post.description: Inserts data into the specified sheet of a Google Spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to insert data into.

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: The name of the sheet to insert data into.

404.description: Not Found – Spreadsheet or Sheet does not exist

401.description: Unauthorized – Missing or invalid API key

post.summary: Append data to a specific sheet in a Google Spreadsheet
post.description: Appends rows of data to the specified sheet in a Google Spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to append data to.

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: The name of the sheet to append data to.

401.description: Unauthorized – Missing or invalid API key

404.description: Not Found – Spreadsheet or Sheet does not exist

get.description: Returns a list of spreadsheet names and IDs that the authenticated user has access to.

error.example: An error occurred: Something went wrong

get.description: Fetches the names of all sheets within a specific spreadsheet using the given spreadsheet ID.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Google Spreadsheet

error.example: An error occurred: Invalid spreadsheet ID.

get.summary: Check if a spreadsheet or a specific sheet exists
get.description: Checks whether a spreadsheet exists by ID, and optionally verifies the existence of a specific sheet name within it.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Spreadsheet

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: The name of the sheet to check (optional)

500.description: Sheet or spreadsheet not found, or an error occurred.

error.example: An error occurred: Invalid spreadsheet ID.

post.summary: Find a value in a specific sheet
post.description: Searches for a specific value in a given sheet of a Google Spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: ID of the Google Spreadsheet

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: Name of the sheet to search in

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The value to search for in the sheet

500.description: Search parameter not found or other error occurred

error.example: An error occurred: Sheet not accessible

get.summary: Get metadata of a specific sheet
get.description: Fetches metadata for a specified sheet within a Google Spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: ID of the Google Spreadsheet

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: Name of the sheet to get metadata for

500.description: Metadata not found or an error occurred

error.example: An error occurred: Sheet not found

get.summary: Clear all data from a sheet
get.description: Clears all values in the specified sheet of a Google Spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: ID of the Google Spreadsheet

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: Name of the sheet to clear

error.example: An error occurred: Sheet not found

get.description: Revokes the current OAuth access token and removes it from cache.
